job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: pstrongOur missionstrongppbrppSleegals mission is to make legal services accessible to everyone At Sleegal we are using machine learning to build a legal marketplace that accurately matches clients with lawyers Today users have to go online to search for lawyers on their own giving calls to multiple lawyers hoping to find the right one with the right price With our tech users find the lawyers that truly match their needs with just a few lines of online chat and completely for freenbspppbrppYou will work closely with our founding team to develop our web products You will play a critical role in improving the user experience for clients and lawyers We will expect you to not only solve problems but propose new ideas that may fundamentally change our productppbrppWe are a dynamic team with a mixed background in law tech and business Our core team members earned degrees from top US law schools and business schools and have deep experience building successful AI products in the Valley ranging from autonomous vehicles to wearable devicesnbspppbrppThis position can start immediately Apply by August 13 2021ppbrppLocation remote our HQ is in the Bay AreappbrppstrongWhats in it for youstrongppbrpulliImplement a fully functioning web application that interacts with our AIdriven platformliliCollaborate with the founding teamnbspto enhance the user experience of the productliliAchieve engineering excellence by building a robust development pipelineliliDesign the machine learning infrastructure for the product and put it into realityliliYou may have to wear multiple hats as a frontend a DevOps a database admin an IT admin etcliliWork with the founding team to design the company longterm roadmap and secure fundraisingliulpbrppstrongYou could be a great fit if you havestrongppbrpulliBackground in computer science or a related fieldlili2 years of industry experienceliliExpert in Javascript Reactjs SCSS for frontend and Nodejs for backend developmentliliExperience with frameworks such as Nextjs or GatsbyliliExperience with AWS ie Lambda DynamoDB SQS etcliliEntrepreneurial a selfstarter motivated to bring a product from 0 to 1liliFrontend design experience or AI experience is preferredliulpbrppstrongWhat to expectstrongppbrpulliAn experienced productive founding team you can trustliliA true tech startup experience with a focus on build with no bureaucracy or big egosliliYou will be working fully virtually with the team that is mainly based in the bay arealiliCompetitive salary with equity of a seedstage companyliliThis is a 40hourweek contractor position with the opportunity to convert to fulltimeliulpbrppstrongOur team mentalitystrongppstrongstrongpulliWe put users first We empathize with the user We follow the KISS principle Keep It Simple StupidliliWe are proactivenbspWe have a bias for actionnbspliliWe own itnbspWe hold each other accountable to deliver resultsliliWe are passionate We know that we are building something great thats meaningfulliliWe trust each other debate and commitnbspWe trust our team members intentions Debates are encouraged but once aligned we follow the consensusnbspwholeheartedlynbspliliWe communicate and overcommunicatenbspWe are growing fast in different directions We believe that communication is the key to alignment across teamsliul
